thread.section_title: Hotel ibis budget London Whitechapel - Brick Lane - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and Convenient
thread.title_full: Clean and Convenient - Review of Hotel ibis budget London Whitechapel - Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kayle T
title: Clean and Convenient
text:
We stayed in a 3 person rooom, double decker. Room's clean and just nice if you only need a bed and to freshen up. If you have kids then maybe you might wanna look for a more spacious room.
Location is great too. Just about 10mins walk from Underground. There's also convenient stores around the area.
Very satisfied stay❤️
